description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5j4vu","text":"Immunofluorescence multi-label protocol for staining free-floating fixed tissue in the Kordower Laboratory.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

documents.ofn: Immunofluor Multi-Label with Same Species Staining Protocol.docx

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"84uak","text":"HISTO- NOTES:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et1sl","text":"Primate tissue staining dishes use  solution per dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5g67s","text":"Rodent tissue staining dishes  solution per dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7tm8t","text":"If staining a large number of primate cases, incubate 1' \u0026 2' Ab in individual cups to conserve volume of Ab used. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2dvf","text":"Be conscious of tissue saturation while washing and incubating. i.e. Check that tissue is fully submerged in solution \u0026 not clumping. This will ensure proper penetration of antibodies \u0026 other reagents. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ksfk","text":"Always include Positive \u0026 Negative Controls.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5oedh","text":"Positive: Use relevant control tissue to confirm specific antibody detection. (i.e. pS129; control tissue should consist of nigral sections previously successfully stained for pS129).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63ep3","text":"Negative: Ideally, use tissue that you know does not contain the targeted antigen. If not available, use a section of tissue not incubated in the 1' Ab (primary delete).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pvc1","text":"When incubating 1' Ab overnight, leave on shaker in refrigerator. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99an7","text":"Can incubate in fridge on a shaker, covered in parafilm, over the weekend or up to 3 days.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o48r","text":"Select a secondary antibody directed against the species in which the primary antibody was raised (i.e. if a primary antibody raised in rabbit is used, an anti-rabbit secondary antibody raised in a species other than rabbit must be used).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65m8a","text":"Store tissue in TBS in the refrigerator at   until mounted.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dh1o","text":"Control for Fragment antibody (Fab): Control tissue should be processed alongside experimental tissue through Day 2, Step 11. Skip second primary incubation all together (Step 12), and complete Day 3. Check under microscope to ensure there is no co-labeling between the two chosen fluorophores.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68bs2","text":"Use appropriate +/- controls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
